page.title: 08GOING TO SECONDARY SCHOOL
page.content: Children who are over 11 and live in Blofield and Blofield Heath go to secondary school at Thorpe St Andrews, on the edge of Norwich about 5 miles away. This a large comprehensive school of about 1300 pupils. The pupils are picked up each morning by several coaches and brought back in the same way in the evening. If you want to stay late at school for a music or sports practice there is a late bus. Sometimes in the winter, when there is heavy snow, the buses are unable to get through to pick up the pupils and in the winter of l985 the school had to close early on several days, as the snow was falling and it wasn't certain that the pupils could get home if they stayed longer.
